text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea ochrophloia (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Red Balau) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is found in Indonesia and Malaysia.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea ochrophloia". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31833A9663790. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31833A9663790.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
